Title: Abbi's Mom
Writer: Ilana Glazer, Abbi Jacobson (created by), Ilana Glazer (created by)
Actors: Abbi Jacobson, Ilana Glazer, Sandra Bernhard, RuPaul
Plot: Abbi's mom comes to the city for a visit; Ilana navigates the intense work culture of Sushi Mambeaux while dealing with her seasonal affective disorder.
